00031 #include <stdio.h>
00032 #include <string.h>
00033 #include <ctype.h>
00034 
00035 /* Returns the next useful line from a file */
00036 int parse_nextline(FILE *fp, char* buffer, int maxbuffer, int first)
00037 {
00038   int i, n, started, p, space, quote;
00039   static int linenr = 0;
00040   
00041   if(first)
00042     linenr = 0;
00043 
00044   do{
00045     buffer[0] = 0;
00046     /* Get a line from the file */
00047     fgets(buffer, maxbuffer-1, fp);
00048     buffer[maxbuffer-1] = 0; /* ensure always have terminating zero */
00049     linenr++;
00050     
00051     n = strlen(buffer);
00052     /* strip out comments and leading whitespace.
00053        Reduce any whitespace to a single space.
00054        Capitalize everything not in quotations
00055     */
00056     started = 0;
00057     space = 0;
00058     p = 0;
00059     quote = 0;
00060     for(i=0;i<n;i++) {
00061       if(buffer[i] == '#') {
00062         /* Start of a comment - ignore the rest of the line */
00063         buffer[p] = 0;
00064         i = n;
00065       }else {
00066         if(started == 0) {
00067           if(isalnum(buffer[i])) {
00068             started = 1;
00069             buffer[p] = toupper(buffer[i]);
00070             p++;
00071           }
00072         }else {
00073           if(isspace(buffer[i])) {
00074             /* white space */
00075             if(space == 0) {
00076               /* start of some white space */
00077               buffer[p] = ' ';
00078               p++;
00079               space = 1;
00080             }
00081           }else {
00082             /* a useful character */
00083             space = 0; /* no longer part of white space */
00084             buffer[p] = buffer[i];
00085 
00086             if(buffer[i] == '"') {
00087               if(quote == 0) {
00088                 quote = 1;
00089               }else if(quote == 1) {
00090                 quote = 0;
00091               }
00092             }else if(buffer[i] == '\'') {
00093               if(quote == 0) {
00094                 quote = 2;
00095               }else if(quote == 2) {
00096                 quote = 0;
00097               }
00098             }else {
00099               if(quote == 0)
00100                 buffer[p] = toupper(buffer[p]);
00101             }
00102             p++;
00103           }
00104         }
00105       }
00106     }
00107     buffer[p] = 0;
00108     n = p;
00109   }while((feof(fp) == 0) && (n == 0));
00110   if(n == 0) {
00111     return(-1);
00112   }
00113   return(linenr);
00114 }
